Adlucem

Founder of Adlucem Architects

Adlucem has been at the forefront of architectural excellence and design. With over a decade of innovative projects, Adlucem founded this studio in 2014 to redefine what premium architecture means globally.

Read More

About us

We work at all scales and in all sectors. We create transformative cultural, corporate , residential and other spaces that work in synchronicity with their surrounding

Form and space are woven within the structure of buildings that evolve from their surroundings and tie disparate programs together. Enticingly contextual, each project combines an unwavering optimism for the future with concepts of connectivity and integration.
